channel.title: Temu on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Temu on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The Unexpected Winners of Trump’s Trade War
item.description: Americans are now hit with tariffs when they shop from overseas sellers on eBay and Etsy. Shein and Temu had months to get ahead of the curve.

item.title: The Unexpected Winners of Trump’s Trade War
item.description: Americans are now hit with tariffs when they shop from overseas sellers on eBay and Etsy. Shein and Temu had months to get ahead of the curve.

item.title: The Duty-Free Loophole Is Closing. What That Means for You—and Your Packages
item.description: President Donald Trump stopped allowing small shipments to enter the country without paying tariffs. Now, things are getting pricier and shipping costs are going up.

item.title: The Duty-Free Loophole Is Closing. What That Means for You—and Your Packages
item.description: President Donald Trump stopped allowing small shipments to enter the country without paying tariffs. Now, things are getting pricier and shipping costs are going up.

item.title: Trump suspends trade loophole for cheap online retailers globally
item.description: US spiking costs to import cheap goods from anywhere rattles e-commerce giants.

item.title: Trump Ends Tariff Exemption for Small Packages
item.description: Starting in September, US buyers on sites like Etsy and eBay may face higher tariffs on goods from abroad.

item.title: Trump Ends Tariff Exemption for Small Packages
item.description: Starting in September, US buyers on sites like Etsy and eBay may face higher tariffs on goods from abroad.
